summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4506 for the improvement of Alki Avenue from Mexico Street to a point approximately 100 feet west of 58th Avenue Southwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52852, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
